items.title: Show HN: AWS VPC/Subnet Calculator and Terraform Generator (Itcmds.ai)
items.summary: I created a subnet generator based off of AWS IP rules. This tool can take the generated subnet information and generate a terraform .tf file for IAC usage. I have some for Azure and GCP as well. I hope this is helpful for someone. Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46188251 Points: 2 # Comments: 0
